alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 5:03AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Columbia, northeastern Suwannee and southeastern Hamilton Counties through 545 AM EST... At 503 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near White Springs to near Obrien. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, White Springs, Wellborn, Five Points, Watertown, Winfield, Suwannee Valley, Mcalpin and Houston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM EST for northern Florida.
